message: could you create a react-native starter app using latest node and expo with docker and docker-compose at the root and the app inside folder frontend which contains Dockerfile and .env file at root and the app inside folder source dont forget to add appuser in Dockerfile so container will be used as user and all generated file will be accecible as non root the project name native-starter
but you used node-20 i asked you to use the latest both node and expo and all dependancies
in the beggining i told you about .env file inside frontend
why use envirenement + .env file at once
all envariable will be inside .env file dont use enverement

create a makefile with the command mobile that will docker compose exec ... start and i dont want compose to run the app i want it to idle i will run the app with exec maybe add command: tail -f /dev/null in compose
